inflation.title: Inflation Calculator
inflation.subtitle: See how inflation affects your purchasing power over time using historical CPI data

results.title: Inflation Result
results.worthIn: Your {startYear} dollar is worth this much in {endYear}
results.historicalNote: Historical Note: From {startYear} to {endYear}, actual average inflation rate was {rate}% (historical)
results.historicalNoteCustom: Historical Note: From {startYear} to {endYear}, actual average inflation rate was {rate}% (custom)

understanding.title: Understanding Inflation
understanding.content: Inflation erodes purchasing power over time. At 3% annual inflation, prices double approximately every 24 years.

investToBeat.title: Invest to Beat Inflation
investToBeat.content: Consider investments that historically outpace inflation, such as stocks, real estate, or inflation-protected securities.

adjustBudget.title: Adjust Your Budget
adjustBudget.content: Account for inflation when planning long-term savings goals. What costs $1,000 today may cost $2,400 in 30 years at 3% inflation.

socialSecurity.title: Social Security COLA
socialSecurity.content: Social Security includes Cost-of-Living Adjustments (COLA) to help beneficiaries keep pace with inflation.

investment401k.title: 401(k) & Retirement Calculator
investment401k.subtitle: Plan your retirement with 401(k) employer matching and compound growth

form.title: 401(k) Details
form.catchUpDesc: Additional contribution if you're 50 or older
form.matchLimitTooltip: Employer matches up to this % of your contribution

maximizeMatch.title: Maximize Employer Match
maximizeMatch.content: Never leave free money on the table. Contribute at least enough to get your full employer match - this is an instant 100% return on your investment.

catchUp.title: Take Advantage of Catch-Up Contributions
catchUp.content: If you're 50 or older, you can contribute up to $31,000 (2025) to your 401(k) with catch-up provisions.

diversify.title: Diversify Your Investments
diversify.content: Consider target-date funds or a mix of stocks and bonds based on your risk tolerance and time horizon.

review.title: Review and Adjust
review.content: Review your 401(k) investments annually and increase contributions as your income grows.

results.onTrackMessage: You're on track to cover {years} years of retirement expenses.
results.actionNeededMessage: There's a gap of {amount} between your savings and retirement needs.
results.recommendationMessage: To meet your retirement goals, consider increasing your annual contribution to:

footer.tagline: Smart tools for smarter financial decisions

about.title: About WealthEase
about.subtitle: Empowering financial decisions through smart tools

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: We believe everyone deserves access to professional-grade financial tools. WealthEase provides free, accurate, and easy-to-use calculators to help you make informed financial decisions and achieve your wealth goals.

story.title: Our Story
story.description: Founded in 2025, WealthEase was created by a team of financial experts and software engineers who saw the need for accessible financial planning tools. We've helped thousands of users plan their retirement, calculate investments, and make smarter financial decisions.

expertise.title: Professional Background & Reliability
expertise.subtitle: Why You Can Trust Our Financial Guidance

formulas.title: Industry-Standard Financial Formulas
formulas.content: All our calculators are based on standard financial mathematical formulas widely recognized and used by financial institutions and professionals. These formulas include:

formulasList.compound: Compound Interest - Using the standard compound interest formula A = P(1 + r/n)^(nt)
formulasList.amortization: Loan Amortization - Employing standard equal installment amortization methods
formulasList.roi: Return on Investment - Based on universally accepted ROI and CAGR calculation formulas
formulasList.retirement: Retirement Planning - Using industry-recognized present value and future value calculation methods

sources.title: Data Sources & References
sources.content: Our calculation methods and financial theories are based on the following authoritative sources:

sourcesList.fp: CFP Board financial planning practice standards
sourcesList.federal: U.S. Federal Reserve System financial literacy education materials
sourcesList.investopedia: Investopedia and other reputable financial education resources

disclaimer.title: Important Disclaimer
disclaimer.content: While we strive to provide accurate and useful calculation tools, please note:
disclaimer.point1: All calculation results are for reference only and do not constitute professional financial, investment, or tax advice
disclaimer.point2: Consult a licensed financial advisor or tax professional before making major financial decisions
disclaimer.point3: Actual investment returns, interest rates, and fees may differ from our assumptions
disclaimer.point4: We do not guarantee specific financial results from using our tools

free.title: Always Free
free.description: All our tools are 100% free with no hidden costs or premium tiers.

accurate.title: Accurate & Reliable
accurate.description: We use industry-standard financial formulas trusted by professionals.

private.title: Privacy First
private.description: Your calculations stay private. We don't store or share your financial data.

simple.title: Simple to Use
simple.description: No financial degree required. Our tools are designed for everyone.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Have questions or feedback? We'd love to hear from you. Our team is here to help.

email.title: Email Us
email.description: For general inquiries, support, or feedback, send us an email and we'll get back to you.

response.title: Response Time
response.description: We typically respond to all inquiries within 24-48 business hours. For urgent matters, please mention it in your email subject.

location.title: Global Service
location.description: WealthEase is an online service available worldwide. We serve users in multiple languages to help them make better financial decisions.

calculator.title: Calculator Questions
calculator.description: Need help understanding our calculators or have questions about results? We're happy to explain.

feedback.title: Feedback & Suggestions
feedback.description: Have ideas for new features or improvements? We value your input and continuously improve based on user feedback.

privacy.title: Privacy Concerns
privacy.description: Questions about how we handle your data? Review our Privacy Policy or reach out directly.

note.title: Important:
note.content: We provide financial calculators for educational purposes only. We cannot provide personalized financial, investment, tax, or legal advice. Please consult a qualified professional for such guidance.

importantNotice.title: Important Notice
importantNotice.content: The information and calculators provided on WealthEase are for general educational and informational purposes only. They should not be construed as professional financial advice.

general.title: General Disclaimer
general.content1: WealthEase ("we", "us", or "our") operates the website wealthease.top and provides financial calculators and educational content. This disclaimer applies to all content on our website.
general.content2: By using our website and tools, you acknowledge that you have read and understood this disclaimer and agree to its terms.

notAdvice.title: Not Professional Financial Advice
notAdvice.content1: The content and tools on WealthEase are provided for educational and informational purposes only. Nothing on this website should be considered as:
notAdvice.content2: Always consult with qualified professionals (such as financial advisors, tax professionals, or attorneys) before making any financial decisions.

accuracy.title: Accuracy of Calculations
accuracy.content1: While we strive to ensure the accuracy of our calculators, the results are estimates based on:

items.estimates: Standard financial formulas and mathematical models
items.assumptions: Assumptions that may not reflect your specific situation
items.market: Market conditions at a specific point in time
items.personal: Information you provide, which may be incomplete

accuracy.content2: Actual financial outcomes may differ significantly from calculator estimates due to market volatility, changing regulations, personal circumstances, and other factors.

noGuarantee.title: No Guarantee of Results
noGuarantee.content1: We do not guarantee any specific financial outcomes from using our calculators or following information on our website. Past performance does not guarantee future results.
noGuarantee.content2: Investment and financial decisions involve risk, including the potential loss of principal. You should carefully consider your investment objectives, risk tolerance, and time horizon before making any financial decisions.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Content
thirdParty.content: Our website may reference or link to third-party content, products, or services. We do not endorse, guarantee, or assume responsibility for any third-party content. References to external sources are for informational purposes only.

items.verify: Verifying the accuracy of any calculations before making decisions
items.consult: Consulting with qualified professionals for personalized advice
items.research: Conducting your own research and due diligence
items.decisions: Any financial decisions you make based on our tools or content

limitation.title: Limitation of Liability
limitation.content: To the maximum extent permitted by law, WealthEase and its owners, employees, and affiliates shall not be liable for any damages, losses, or expenses arising from the use of our website, calculators, or content. This includes, but is not limited to, direct, indirect, incidental, consequential, or punitive damages.

seekAdvice.title: Seek Professional Advice
seekAdvice.content: For important financial decisions, we strongly recommend consulting with qualified professionals, including:

contact.title: Questions About This Disclaimer
contact.content: If you have any questions about this disclaimer, please contact us:

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content1: Welcome to WealthEase. By accessing or using our website (wealthease.top) and services, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service ('Terms'). If you do not agree to these Terms, please do not use our services.
acceptance.content2: We may update these Terms from time to time. Your continued use of our services after any changes constitutes acceptance of the new Terms.

services.title: Description of Services
services.content: WealthEase provides free online financial calculators and educational resources, including but not limited to:

items.calculators: Financial calculators (compound interest, retirement planning, loan, mortgage, ROI, etc.)
items.blog: Educational blog articles about personal finance

useRules.title: Acceptable Use
useRules.content: By using our services, you agree to:

items.lawful: Use the services only for lawful purposes
items.accurate: Provide accurate information when using our calculators
items.noHarm: Not attempt to harm, disrupt, or interfere with our services
items.noCommercial: Not use our services for unauthorized commercial purposes
items.noReverse: Not reverse engineer, decompile, or attempt to extract the source code

disclaimer.title: Financial Disclaimer
disclaimer.content1: The calculators and information provided on WealthEase are for educational and informational purposes only. They are not intended to provide, and should not be relied upon for, financial, investment, tax, legal, or accounting advice.
disclaimer.content2: The results from our calculators are estimates based on the information you provide and standard financial formulas. Actual results may vary based on numerous factors not considered by our tools.
disclaimer.content3: Always consult with qualified financial professionals before making any financial decisions.

accuracy.title: Accuracy of Information
accuracy.content1: While we strive to provide accurate and up-to-date information, we make no warranties or representations about the accuracy, reliability, completeness, or timeliness of any content on our website.
accuracy.content2: Financial markets and regulations change frequently. Information that was accurate at the time of publication may become outdated.

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content1: All content on WealthEase, including but not limited to text, graphics, logos, images, calculators, and software, is the property of WealthEase and is protected by copyright and other intellectual property laws.
intellectualProperty.content2: You may use our calculators for personal, non-commercial purposes. Any other use requires our prior written consent.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Links
thirdParty.content: Our website may contain links to third-party websites or services. We are not responsible for the content, privacy policies, or practices of any third-party sites. Your use of third-party websites is at your own risk.

limitation.title: Limitation of Liability
limitation.content1: To the fullest extent permitted by law, WealthEase shall not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages resulting from your use of or inability to use our services.
limitation.content2: This includes, without limitation, damages for loss of profits, data, goodwill, or other intangible losses, even if we have been advised of the possibility of such damages.

indemnification.title: Indemnification
indemnification.content: You agree to indemnify and hold harmless WealthEase, its officers, directors, employees, and agents from any claims, damages, losses, liabilities, and expenses (including legal fees) arising from your use of our services or violation of these Terms.

termination.title: Termination
termination.content: We reserve the right to terminate or suspend your access to our services at any time, without prior notice, for any reason, including violation of these Terms.

governingLaw.title: Governing Law
governingLaw.content: These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with applicable laws. Any disputes arising under these Terms shall be resolved through appropriate legal channels.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time. We will notify users of any material changes by posting the new Terms on this page and updating the 'Last Updated' date. Your continued use of our services after such modifications constitutes acceptance of the updated Terms.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us:

intro.title: Introduction
intro.content1: WealthEase ('we', 'our', or 'us') is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website wealthease.top and use our financial calculators and tools.
intro.content2: Please read this privacy policy carefully. If you do not agree with the terms of this privacy policy, please do not access the site.

dataCollection.title: Information We Collect
dataCollection.content: We collect information that can be used to improve our services and enhance your experience:

items.analytics: Browser type, operating system, and device information
items.cookies: Pages visited and time spent on pages

noFinancialData.title: We Do NOT Collect Financial Information
noFinancialData.content: WealthEase is designed with your privacy in mind. All calculations are performed locally in your browser. We do NOT collect, store, or transmit any of your financial information, including but not limited to: income, savings, debts, investments, loan amounts, interest rates, or any other financial data you enter into our calculators. Your financial information never leaves your device.

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking Technologies
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar technologies to collect information about your browsing activities:

items.analytics: Google Analytics for understanding user behavior and improving our services
items.advertising: Google AdSense cookies for displaying relevant advertisements

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParty.content: We use reputable third-party services to operate our website and improve our services:

items.google: Google Analytics and Google AdSense for analytics and advertising
items.vercel: Vercel Inc. for website hosting and infrastructure

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your information against unauthorized or unlawful processing, accidental loss, destruction, or damage. However, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.

userRights.title: Your Rights and Choices
userRights.content: Depending on your location, you may have the following rights regarding your personal data:

items.access: The right to access and receive a copy of your personal data
items.correction: The right to rectify inaccurate or incomplete data
items.deletion: The right to request deletion of your personal data
items.objection: The right to object to processing of your personal data

children.title: Children's Privacy
children.content: Our services are not intended for children under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13. If you are a parent or guardian and believe your child has provided us with personal information, please contact us, and we will delete such information.

changes.title: Changes to This Privacy Policy
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the 'Last Updated' date. You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us:
